entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
